ctu_text: \n", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The \"Dr. Bhim Rao Ambedkar Meritorious Student Award Scheme\" was launched by the Scheduled Caste Welfare Department, Government of Madhya Pradesh, to encourage students from the Scheduled Caste category to achieve high academic scores and motivate them to pursue higher education. This scheme awards special prizes to meritorious Scheduled Caste students who secure the highest marks in the Class 10th and 12th board examinations conducted by the Board of Secondary Education, CBSE, and ICSE in the state.
